name: Field Agent
tag_list: business, enterprise, information, research, mobile, crowd-sourcing, retail, cpg, real-estate
overview:
We’ve made it our mission to provide a link from people sitting in a workplace to useful information anywhere in the world. Our Clients are businesses or individuals that need information. Anyone with a credit card can sign up as a client. We’re specifically built to partner with businesses, and have made strategic decisions to innovate where it’s helpful to you.

We enable every day people utilizing the latest in mobile technology to deliver relevant, nearly instant business information. We call these amazing people Agents. We’re constantly impressed with the acumen of our Agents whose local knowledge is invaluable. We have thousands of Agents that provide nationwide coverage for collecting real world intelligence. If you’re interested in being an Agent you can download the Field Agent app.
